channel.title: Joining a Server
channel.description: I just downloaded the LegendScape Client, Cache, and Server, but I can not figure out how to access the game. Is there anyone that can tell me how? I just started Mopar today so I am not very to-date on how to do all of this stuff. Thanks, MO_Vannaka.

item.description:

well if u hav just joined 2day then take it easy and play mopar 4 a bit
